Headline: Update: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute near Irving Park/Keeler
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses rrtd EB: Irving Pk, Kilpatrick, Milwaukee, Cicero, Montrose, Elston, and Irving Pk; WB: Irving Pk, Elston, Montrose, Cicero, and Irving Pk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Irving Park/Keeler.

Eastbound buses will operate via Irving Park, Kilpatrick, Milwaukee, Cicero, Montrose, Elston, and Irving Park.

Westbound buses will operate via Irving Park, Elston, Montrose, Cicero, and Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/28th
ShortDescription: Update:53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 31st, Lawndale, 26th, and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/28th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 31st, Lawndale, 26th, and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/28th.

Allow extra travel time.
